Title: FP Interpreter (Silverlight) and Wiki
Description:
Implementation of John Backus's programming language FP in Silverlight and F#.

Based on original ocaml project by  Christophe Deleuze

http://christophe.deleuze.free.fr/D/fp.html

There is also a wiki on FP (in russian!) that makes use of the interpreter
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Implementation of John Backus's programming language FP in Silverlight and F#.

Based on original ocaml project by Christophe Deleuze

http://christophe.deleuze.free.fr/D/fp.html

There is also a wiki on FP (in russian!) that makes use of the interpreter


More on John Backus and FP Programming Language can be found in wikipedia
  1. John Backus
  2. FP Systems

The solution requires F# September CTP and Silverlight 2.0 SDK to build

The wiki is based on Screw Turn Wiki
